targets.expr: max(label_replace(label_replace(patroni_master{job="postgresql"}==1, "node_name", "$1", "instance", "^([^:]+):.*$") * on (node_name) group_left() label_replace((sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[$__rate_interval])))), "node_name", "$1", "instance", "^([^:]+):.*$"), "datacentre", "$1", "instance", "^([^-]+)-.*$")) by (datacentre)

max(avg(label_replace(couchbase_bucket_stats_cpu_utilization_rate{instance=~"(de1|gb1|gb4|gb5).+"}, "datacentre", "$1", "instance", "^([^-]+)-.*$")) by (datacentre, cluster)) by (datacentre) + stddev(avg(label_replace(couchbase_bucket_stats_cpu_utilization_rate{instance=~"(de1|gb1|gb4|gb5).+"}, "datacentre", "$1", "instance", "^([^-]+)-.*$")) by (datacentre, cluster)) by (datacentre)

max(avg(label_replace(couchbase_bucket_stats_cpu_utilization_rate{instance=~"(de1|gb1|gb4|gb5).+"}, "datacentre", "$1", "instance", "^([^-]+)-.*$")) by (datacentre, cluster)) by (datacentre) - stddev(avg(label_replace(couchbase_bucket_stats_cpu_utilization_rate{instance=~"(de1|gb1|gb4|gb5).+"}, "datacentre", "$1", "instance", "^([^-]+)-.*$")) by (datacentre, cluster)) by (datacentre)
